<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6c2b7b8055b96463f78abb70f58c4c6d6d4b9d55|patch 8.2.0578: heredoc for interfaces does not support "trim">
patch 8.2.0578: heredoc for interfaces does not support "trim"

Problem:    Heredoc for interfaces does not support "trim".
Solution:   Update the script heredoc support to be same as the :let command.
            (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5916)

attachments.text: Problem: Heredoc for interfaces does not support "trim". Solution: Update the script heredoc support to be same as the :let command. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5916)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4d5d0dfe9438bd5f2daa41ebbe6ac9a76d165af0|patch 8.2.0579: Coverity warns for unused value>
patch 8.2.0579: Coverity warns for unused value

Problem:    Coverity warns for unused value.
Solution:   Change order and use "else if".
